summary: Changes the appearance of many NPC's in Skyrim, mostly female and a few select male. *Note* No Orcs, Argonians, or Khajit were harmed in the making of this mod.
descriptionHtml:
Name: NPCOverhaul
Version: 1.0
Date: 11/8/2013
Category: NPCs
Requirements: Player-Created MOD(s): Falskaar, Official Bethesda MOD(s): Dawnguard DLC, 
HearthFires DLC, Dragonborn DLC

Author(s): Drax8

Description
===========
Changes the appearance of many NPC's in Skyrim, mostly female and a few select male. *Note* No 
Orcs, Argonians, or Khajit were harmed in the making of this mod.


Details
=======
I originally made this mod for myself, and decided to upload it for anyone who may want to use 
it. I know it isn't for everyone, but if you like it, feel free to use it. I know there are 
other mods like this, this is just my own personal version. I hope you like it!

I changed all female named NPC's and a few select male NPC's giving them new hair, and in some 
cases, changing facial features. All of the females were given ApachiiSkyHair, as were some of 
the males, however some males just have a different vanilla hair style.

This mod includes all generated facegen data for the changed NPC's, so they will not have 
mismatched heads/bodies. Please let me know if there are any issues with this.

Additionally, I changed all Dunmer to have either white or black hair. Just my personal 
preference.

*Please Note* No Orcs, Argonians, or Khajit were harmed in the making of this mod!

Requirements:
Dawnguard
HearthFires
Dragonborn
Falskaar
ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_5_Full
ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_3
ApachiiSkyHairMale_v_1_1
**While not required, I highly recommend ApachiiSkyHair Natural Retexture by Aron - 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35092/? **

If there is any interest, I will upload version that don't require Falskaar, etc. I use it and 
all DLC's, which is why this mod requires them.

Appearance mods used in screenshots:
FEMALE-CBBE v3.2.3 Curvy, body and face textures by Caliente
Sporty Sexy Map - Athletic Muscle mod by Xs2reality
XCE - warpaint and dirt by Xenius
MALE-Better Males-Faces - YoungerFacesMergedWithMenByGeonox by Chris57
Better Males-Underwear - Default by Chris57
XCE - warpaint and dirt by Xenius

ENB - Sharpshooters Original Extreme Graphics, patched for ENBoost, with DOF from RealVision ENB 
and Extensive Shaders.



Install
=======
1. Download with NMM and activate, enjoy!

-OR-

2. Manually download and drop contents into your Skyrim/Data folder. Be sure to activate the 
.esp.

Uninstall
=========
1. Uninstall with NMM.

-OR-

2. Delete the NPCOverhaul.esp from your Data folder. Also delete the attached facegen data in 
the following folders:

Skyrim/Data/Textures/actors/character/facegendata/facetint/Dawnguard.esm
Skyrim/Data/Textures/actors/character/facegendata/facetint/Dragonborn.esm
Skyrim/Data/Textures/actors/character/facegendata/facetint/Falskaar.esm
Skyrim/Data/Textures/actors/character/facegendata/facetint/HearthFires.esm
Skyrim/Data/Textures/actors/character/facegendata/facetint/Skyrim.esm

Load Order
===========
This mod should be placed at the bottom of your load order, but ABOVE any bashed patches and SkyProc patches (if you use any of those). The very bottom of my load order for example:

NPCOverhaul.esp
BashedPatch, 0.esp
Automatic Variants.esp
Dual Sheath Redux Patch.esp
ReProccer.esp

Incompatibility
===============
Incompatible with mods that alter any of the same NPC's. However can be used with such mods. For 
example, if you use a mod that alters Aela and want to use that, just make sure it loads after 
this mod, and it will still work.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
No known issues or bugs.

History
=======
1.0, 11/8/2013 Initial Release

Contact
=======


Credits
=======

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to TESNexus.com for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
Thanks to apachii for the amazing ApachiiSkyHair mod.

Tools Used
==========
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but don't complain to me if it 
doesn't work or your PC blows up.
author: Drax8
